section.name: German i18n
section.p: After English and Japanese, German is the third language Antidote has been localized to! Many others may follow!?!

section.name: Antidote News Page
section.p: To show, that we are really continue the work on Antidote, I set up this news page to inform you all about the progress. Additonally I'd like to encourage you to use and test Antidote, or - of course - take part in the development!
